title: Data set rating of self worth what is median

content.prompt:
3 4 5 5 7 7 7 8 8 10

Ten participants in a treatment group were asked to rate their feelings of self worth on a scale of one to ten, with a value of ten indicating a very positive feeling of self-worth. The data for the participants are above.

What is the mean for these data?

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality

skill.text: 3.B: Calculate and interpret measures of central tendency, variation, and percentile rank in a given data set.
